ygData.subject: RE: Lifetaps and Races
ygData.msgSnippet: An ogre has an attack rating of a DE of about 4 levels higher, and a troll has one of a DE of about 3 levels higher.  I don t know about HP, tho. ... From:
ygData.messageBody:
An ogre has an attack rating of a DE of about 4 levels higher, and a troll
has one of a DE of about 3 levels higher. I don't know about HP, tho.


-----Original Message-----
From: Steven E. Phipps
To: shadowknight@onelist.com
Sent: 10/26/99 11:35 AM
Subject: Re: [shadowknight] Lifetaps and Races

From: "Steven E. Phipps" <phipps@...>

Take away all magic items, and I believe you will find no real
significant
difference. The small difference that is there can easily be made up for
with magic items. I think the difference in damage will be
insignificant as
well. (i.e. 2 level 40 SK, one ogre, one De. Both naked except for a
BIBS)
I think there will be little difference in both hitpoints and damage. If
there is a small difference, it can be made up for via items. DE with
more
+str items, while the ogre more +agi items.
Have no real statistics though, anyone else?

Morgul

Big races do get the Slam deal, but not sure if that trades off with the
xtra KOS and dependancy on a shaman for shrink.
----- Original Message -----
From: Wilson, ThomasX B <thomasx.b.wilson@...>
To: <shadowknight@onelist.com>
Sent: Tuesday, October 26, 1999 12:27 PM
Subject: RE: [shadowknight] Lifetaps and Races


> From: "Wilson, ThomasX B" <thomasx.b.wilson@...>
>
> Since I've never played a troll or an Ogre how many more Hps do they
have
> compared to a DE or Human? Anybody happen to know?
>
>
